ruleset.name: Basic MXML Rules
ruleset.description: The Basic MXML Ruleset contains a collection of good practices which everyone should follow.

rule.message: There are more than 1 public variable in this MXML component
There are more than 2 public variables in this MXML component
This binding expression is too long ({0} dots maximum, but {1} actually)
rule.description: A Binding expression is executed as soon as one of the bindable attributes changed. If a binding expression contains too many expression, there could be some performance issue.

rule.message: This script block is too long ({0} maximum, but {1} actually)
This container is too deeply nested.
rule.description: Nested containers can decrease application overall performance especially if they are in item renderers.
Code behind files are tightly coupled with the view, not unit-testable, not easy to navigate the code code base and not reusable. Try using presentation model pattern, or observer pattern
